Agents.Base

Class BaseInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agents.Base.BaseInformation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanInformation, ZombieInformation

    public abstract class BaseInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for the information classes of the agents of the zombie epidemic environment

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int gunshotWounds
      Number of shots received
      protected AgentLifeStatus lifeStatus
      Life status of the agent
      protected java.awt.geom.Point2D position
      Current position of the agent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseInformation(BaseInformation information)
      Create the information object from another information object
      BaseInformation(double x, double y)
      Create an agent's information using an arbitrary position, with the life status to Alive value and with 0 number of shots received
      BaseInformation(java.awt.geom.Point2D position)
      Create an agent's information using an arbitrary position, with the life status to Alive value and with 0 number of shots received
      BaseInformation(java.awt.geom.Point2D position, AgentLifeStatus lifeStatus, int gunshotWounds)
      Constructor that allows to completely set the agent's state
